Text: (NYSE:LOW) EVP Jennifer L. Weber sold 12,589 shares of the firm's stock in a transaction on Monday, September 16th. The shares were sold at an average price of $112.62, for a total transaction of $1,417,773.18. Following the completion of the transaction, the executive vice president now directly owns 17,440 shares of the company's stock, valued at approximately $1,964,092.80.
